name: Nexter Systems
goal: Nexter is an European Leader in the domain of Defence Land systems and supports armed and security forces by providing them means to fullfil their needs. The company is oriented towards innovation, R&D, design and realisation of complex systems, preparation of futur equipment and international cooperation. In the scope of its activities, Nexter pays special attention to the respect of ethical, social and economical responsibilities.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
European Defense Action Plan.
European defense fund, Preparatory Action for Defense Research, European Defense Industrial Development Programme.
Permanent Structured Cooperation.
Framework Programme Horizon 2020 and Horizon Europe.
Foreign Direct Investment.
